data.title: Publicity photo of Thelma Todd
data.meta_description: This publicity shot of head and shoulders of Thelma Todd was used to advertise her leading role in the movie "Lightning Strikes Twice". It was also used when the newspapers reported that a burglar had ransacked her home and taken $2000 in perfumes.
